Outcome: Permanent tooth surfaces D(M)FS increment PF - nearest to 3 years
Reasons for GRADE if not High: The quality of the evidence was downgraded due to considerable heterogeneity; 9 trials were at high and 4 trials at unclear risk of bias. However this body of evidence showed a consistent, large clinically important effect and we have upgraded the quality of evidence to moderate

Outcome: Deciduous tooth surfaces d((e)/m)fs increment PF - nearest to 3 years
Reasons for GRADE if not High: The quality of the evidence was downgraded due to considerable heterogeneity; 5 trials were at high and 5 trials at unclear risk of bias. However this body of evidence showed a consistent, large clinically important effect and we have upgraded the quality of evidence to moderate
